text: Quick question: Is it possible to private message another user on the Julia Discourse? I couldn't find a button for it but it might be because I haven't posted enough?

elements.text: Quick question: Is it possible to private message another user on the Julia Discourse? I couldn't find a button for it but it might be because I haven't posted enough?

text: Hey <@U0138UTB7A4>, Thanks for asking this question. Is it okay if we cross post this to Discourse for further visibility and in case someone has the same question in the future? If so, please react with :bridge: on the original message you sent above above ^ (not this threaded reply). Note that only reactions from the posts author will trigger a re-post. Thank you for being here!
I have no idea if there is a reputation limit of any sort, but if you go to <https://discourse.julialang.org/u/giordano/messages> you should be able to write a new message directed to someone

text: Haha I went to my messages tab, but it just shows me my inbox, with no way to send messages?

text: Ah I see, it might be a reputation thing. I don't have that option on my end. Using firefox, on linux. But probably a reputation thing

text: if you scroll down, you can see trust levels

elements.text: if you scroll down, you can see trust levels

text:
for Basic:

```New user restrictions have been lifted; you’ve been granted all essential community abilities, such as personal messaging, flagging, wiki editing, and the ability to post multiple images and links.```

text: I'd ask this question in <https://discourse.julialang.org/c/meta/3>, so maybe you can get some more reputation :rolling_on_the_floor_laughing:
